text:
Ready for a spooky Halloween treat? Then look no further — as we recently discovered a husband’s pumpkin-themed dudeoir shoot for his wife, featuring hilarious photos you NEED to see!

If there’s a “Husband Of The Year” award, then this brave man should win it, as he recently stripped down for a nude photo shoot with pumpkins for his talented photographer wife. Gayla Thompson (GT Photography) made a simple request — she reportedly asked her husband to pose for this dudeoir (dude + boudoir), and he happily obliged. Even better, he took things to the next level by posing in a field with pumpkins covering his private parts. We can’t tell if he’s mocking sexy Halloween pictorials or not, but the resulting photos are hilarious, and if this isn’t love, then we don’t know what is!

During the elaborate photo shoot, which is making rounds online, Gayla’s husband posed in the bed of a truck with a gourd covering his penis. Then, for another image, he poured beer all over his body as he held a pumpkin close to his waist. And that’s not all — there are so many other hilarious poses that you need to see to believe. Could this man have just started a holiday trend we never knew we needed? We can only hope!

And speaking of sexy holiday-themed photo shoots, don’t you think the Kardashians should do something similar? Kim Kardashian wouldn’t even need pumpkins — she could literally just paint ones on her butt cheeks and we’d think they were real pieces of fruit. (And yes, pumpkins are a type of fruit — that small tidbit blew our minds, but it’s true.) Anyway, after seeing this sexy naked photo shoot, this man has now become our hero. May we suggest he does a similar shoot with turkey legs and pumpkin pies for Thanksgiving? If only…

HollywoodLifers, how do YOU feel about this husband’s pumpkin-themed dudeoir photo shoot? Tell us below!
title: Man Mocks Sexy Halloween Pictorials & Does His Own Naked Photo Shoot With Pumpkins
